snippet.title: Tales of Kenzera: ZAU Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
It's nearly time to begin your adventure, young shaman. Only a few days left to catch our pre-order offer*, including 10% off. Explore the beautiful and treacherous lands of Kenzera with the God of Death in Tales of Kenzera™: ZAU, coming to Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation® 5, PC, and Nintendo Switch on April 23, 2024.

It's time to wield the dance of the shaman and reclaim your father’s spirit.

Crafted by Surgent Studios, the entertainment studio founded by actor Abubakar Salim (Assassin's Creed: Origins, Raised by Wolves) and published by EA Originals, Tales of Kenzera™: ZAU is a metroidvania-style adventure and a thrilling emotional journey inspired by the rich myths of Bantu cultures.

Pre-order Offer*:
Embark on your journey with special perks if you pre-order!
- Start with a 10% discount
- Wrap yourself in Kalunga's Blessing visual effect variant
- Kickstart your adventure with 2 shaman points to unlock up to 2 skills in-game 
- Discover more of our world with the “Soulshifters” digital companion comic

*Conditions and restrictions apply. See http://ea.com/games/tales-of-kenzera/zau/disclaimers for details.

Find out more about Tales of Kenzera: ZAU at http://ea.com/games/tales-of-kenzera/zau

Follow us on
Discord: https://discord.gg/surgent
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@surgentstudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/surgentstudios
Twitter (X): https://twitter.com/ZauTheGame
